description:

author: Rai Furniss-Greasley
description:
Futility is the latest novel from Nuzo Onoh, who has been championing African horror and receiving international acclaim for a little over a decade. She works African – or, more specifically Nigerian – folk and mythology into her work to explore the horror genre. She has been dubbed ‘Queen of African Horror’ and, with this […]

title: REVIEW: Futility by Nuzo Onoh
